short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solving Wordle has never been easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If at any point while you're solving a Wordle puzzle you find yourself searching for a word with certain letters in particular places, but can't think of any, open up the WordlHelper extension and build a word using the available wildcards. This will generate a list of five letter words that match the wildcards you selected.
